reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is very knowledgeable and passionate about the subject. The classes are engaging, but the workload can be heavy.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Smith explains complex concepts clearly and is always available for help. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Dr. Davis is well-organized, but the lectures can be a bit dry. More interactive elements would be helpful.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Brown makes difficult topics more understandable with real-world examples. Tests are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson's classes are difficult to follow, and there is little feedback on assignments.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is an excellent teacher with a lot of industry experience. The projects are practical and relevant.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Taylor presents material clearly and encourages critical thinking. The course is well-structured.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is knowledgeable, but the course could benefit from more interactive activities.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Anderson is incredibly insightful and engages students in deep discussions. A truly enriching experience.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Dr. Thomas is a skilled lecturer with a knack for making complex problems understandable. The labs are very informative.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Jackson's passion for literature is evident. The readings are thought-provoking, though some assignments can be overwhelming.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Harris provides good foundational knowledge, but the course could use more real-life examples.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Prof. Clark is an exceptional teacher with a deep knowledge of art history. The lectures are engaging and informative.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis' lectures are often disorganized and lack clarity. The grading can be inconsistent.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Prof. Robinson is very passionate about the subject and incorporates current events into the lessons. Highly engaging.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. Walker provides a solid introduction to statistics, but the pace of the course can be too fast for some students.

reviews.subject: French
reviews.review: Prof. Hall is a great language instructor with effective teaching methods. The class is interactive and enjoyable.

reviews.subject: Geology
reviews.review: Dr. Young's enthusiasm for geology is infectious. The field trips and hands-on activities are excellent.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. King is knowledgeable and passionate. The class can be challenging but rewarding for those interested in music theory.

reviews.subject: Biochemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Wright has a deep understanding of biochemistry but struggles with making the material engaging for students.

reviews.subject: Creative Writing
reviews.review: Prof. Scott provides valuable feedback and fosters a supportive environment for creative expression. Highly recommended.
